update saas_inventory
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_date = #{invDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_type = #{invType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_range = #{invRange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
warehouse_id = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
warehouse_name = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_area_ids = #{warehouseAreaIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_area_names = #{warehouseAreaNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_area_ids = #{cargoAreaIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cargo_area_names = #{cargoAreaNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
register_man_id = #{registerManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
register_man_code = #{registerManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_man_name = #{registerManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
register_type = #{registerType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_man_id = #{invManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
inv_man_code = #{invManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inv_man_name = #{invManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
second_inv_man_id = #{secondInvManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
second_inv_man_code = #{secondInvManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
second_inv_man_name = #{secondInvManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_date = #{handleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handle_man_id = #{handleManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
handle_man_code = #{handleManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_man_name = #{handleManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_date = #{postDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
post_man_id = #{postManId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
post_man_code = #{postManCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_man_name = #{postManName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity_total = #{quantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
varieties_quantity = #{varietiesQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
inv_quantity_total = #{invQuantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_quantity_total = #{diffQuantityTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
amount_total = #{amountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_amount_total = #{realAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_amount_total = #{diffAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
notax_amount_total = #{notaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_notax_amount_total = #{realNotaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_notax_amount_total = #{diffNotaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tax_amount_total = #{taxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_tax_amount_total = #{realTaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_tax_amount_total = #{diffTaxAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
retail_amount_total = #{retailAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
real_retail_amount_total = #{realRetailAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
diff_retail_amount_total = #{diffRetailAmountTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creater_code = #{createrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier_id = #{modifierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier_code = #{modifierCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier_name = #{modifierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_inventory inventory WHERE 1=1
AND (inventory.status = 1 OR inventory.status = 2)
AND (inventory.status = 1 )
AND inventory.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId}
and inventory.code = #{paramForListVO.code}
and inventory.inv_man_name like concat('%',#{paramForListVO.invManName},'%')
and inventory.register_man_name like concat('%',#{paramForListVO.registerManName},'%')
and inventory.register_date >= #{paramForListVO.startDate} and inventory.register_date <= #{paramForListVO.endDate}
and inventory.inv_date = #{paramForListVO.invDate}
order by inventory.id desc,inventory.register_date desc,inventory.code desc
order by inventory.id desc,inventory.register_date ,inventory.code
order by inventory.id desc,inventory.register_date desc,inventory.code
order by inventory.id desc,inventory.register_date ,inventory.code desc

SELECT sum(diff_amount_total) as diffAmountTotalAll, sum(diff_notax_amount_total) as diffNotaxAmountTotalAll, sum(diff_tax_amount_total) as diffTaxAmountTotalAll FROM saas_inventory inventory WHERE 1=1 and status = 3

SELECT inventory.id,inventory.code,inventory.post_date as postDate,inventory.post_man_id as postManId, inventory.post_man_name as postManName,inventory.remark FROM saas_inventory inventory WHERE enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId} and id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE saas_inventory set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
